irawati ina application of students character education through culture of s senyum salam sapa sopan santun silaturahmi at sdn banyuajuh kamal a thesis elementary school teacher education program faculty of education university of trunojoyo madura advisor i priyono tri febrianto s sos m si advisor ii rika wulandari s pd m pd abstract this research was a qualitative descriptive research which was held at sdn banyuajuh kamal sampling used purposive sampling technique subjects were a headmaster class teachers extracurricular teachers and also a few students this research aimed to describe an application of students character education through culture of s senyum salam sapa sopan santun silaturahmi at sdn banyuajuh kamal which are teacher s understanding about the intrinsic meaning of character education values of the culture of s activities in the culture of s result of this research was this school applied the culture of s senyum salam sapa sopan santun silaturahmi the teachers understood well about the intrinsic meaning of character education values which was in the culture of s were loving peace tolerancing and caring about social life activities of the culture of s was did in many self development program they were routine and spontaneous activities exemplariness and conditioning activities of this culture was also applied in many class learning and extracurricular activities keywords character education culture of s senyum salam sapa sopan santun silaturahmi
